wikipedia_page.main: Dawid Johannes Malan ( DAH-vid mə-LAN; brother of J Malan born 3 September 1987) is an English cricketer who plays for England and Yorkshire. He was previously ranked first in the ICC T20I batsman rankings, and has achieved the highest ever rating (915 points) in the format.

*On 14 December 2017, WACA hosted its final Ashes Test, and possibly final international match. In that match, both Dawid Malan (140) and Mitchell Marsh scored their maiden Test centuries (Marsh reached 181) and Jonny Bairstow scored his first century in Australia, Steve Smith scored his maiden home Test double-century, then went on to his highest Test score (239). Smith and Marsh also achieved the highest partnership for the 5th wicket at the WACA (301). The match ended with Australia regaining the Ashes.(Scorecard).

Many professional cricketers have had endorsement deals with the company, including Ben Stokes (England), Dawid Malan (England), Aiden Markram (South Africa), Quinton de Kock (South Africa) and Ross Taylor (New Zealand), as well as former international captains Graeme Smith (South Africa), Steve Waugh (Australia), Stephen Fleming (New Zealand), Michael Vaughan (England) and Anil Kumble (India) Steven McAllister (Flinders/Marion) and opener Sami Aslam from Pakistan
